Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.http

Class TestMetaBrowser

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.http.TestMetaBrowser
public class TestMetaBrowser extends Object
Cluster-backed correctness tests for the functionality provided by MetaBrowser.
